EmailTemplate.description: This is the email alert when an advance batch approval is submitted.
EmailTemplate.name: Advance Batch Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: The following advances have been submitted for approval - Batch #{!Batch_Approval__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.Name},
These advances have been submitted for approval and are ready for review.
Please see attached CSV file for a list of these advances.
To view the approval record, please click {!Batch_Approval__c.Link}.
